zserio.runtime

Interface SizeOf


  • public interface SizeOf
    Interface for a size calculation for classes generated by Zserio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int bitSizeOf()
      Gets the bit length of object stored in bit stream.
      int bitSizeOf(long bitPosition)
      Gets the bit length of object stored in bit stream.
      int bitSizeOf(PackingContextNode contextNode, long bitPosition)
      Gets the bit length of packed object stored in bit stream.
      void initPackingContext(PackingContextNode contextNode)
      Initializes whole packing context subtree.

    • Method Detail

      • initPackingContext

        void initPackingContext(PackingContextNode contextNode)
        Initializes whole packing context subtree.
        Parameters:
        contextNode - Packing context node.

      • bitSizeOf

        int bitSizeOf()
        Gets the bit length of object stored in bit stream. It is supposed that the current bit stream position is zero. The bit size of object can depend on current bit stream position because of alignment.
        Returns:
        Length of the object in number of bits.

      • bitSizeOf

        int bitSizeOf(long bitPosition)
        Gets the bit length of object stored in bit stream.
        Parameters:
        bitPosition - Current bit stream position.
        Returns:
        Length of the object in number of bits.

      • bitSizeOf

        int bitSizeOf(PackingContextNode contextNode,
              long bitPosition)
        Gets the bit length of packed object stored in bit stream.
        Parameters:
        contextNode - Packing context node.
        bitPosition - Current bit stream position.
        Returns:
        Length of the packed object in number of bits.
